Sentencas: Different Mn-Zr-O samples were synthesised and evaluated to develop a highly active sorbent for H2S removal.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of Mn-Zr-O high-temperature desulphurisation and solid oxide fuel cells performance test

Sentencas: We investigate impact of different factors like the preparation of calcinations temperature, space velocity and different La content on desulphurisation performance.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of Mn-Zr-O high-temperature desulphurisation and solid oxide fuel cells performance test

Sentencas: The simulated gas after desulphurisation was passed into the solid oxide fuel cells for the first time.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of Mn-Zr-O high-temperature desulphurisation and solid oxide fuel cells performance test

Sentencas: It was found that there was no attenuation of solid oxide fuel cells life through 24 hours, which provide a powerful support to the application of direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation and characterisation of Mn-Zr-O high-temperature desulphurisation and solid oxide fuel cells performance test
